subject: Order #SSN5908
description_text:
Good evening, I recently placed this order, paying for the fastest and
most express shipping you offered, but the package still hasn't
arrived. Why? Thank you and best regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi Christian Cardellini,  ​​​It is found that your package is in normal transit. The time limit for expedited delivery is 3-7 working days. Please wait patiently. Thank you for your inquiry. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.
